eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A CIVIL EMERGENCY MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Platte, NE; AT 07:04 PM ON SEP 14, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 09:04 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: MISSING CHILD: Columbus Police ask the public to search their property for a missing 7-year-old girl. She was last seen near 16th St & 21st Ave in Columbus wearing a light tan skirt, maroon shirt, gray tennis shoes, and bow in her hair. Call CPD with any info at 402-564-3201 opt 2.
